author: wn.com
title: Join HuffPost As We Break Down The Democratic Primary Debate
text: The first Democratic primary debate of the 2016 race is happening on Oct. 13, and The Huffington Post is getting in on the action. Join Zach Carter and Jason Linkins on Tuesday night for updates and analysis on the candidates, and the best and worst moments from the CNN debate. Watch the video above, and some of our favorite outtakes below. -- This feed and its contents are the property of The Huffington Post, and use is subject to our terms. It may be used for personal consumption, but may not be distributed on a website.
